displayName: Ensure 'DBA_SYS_PRIVS.%' Is Revoked from Unauthorized 'GRANTEE' with 'ADMIN_OPTION' Set to 'YES'
rationale: Assignment of the `WITH_ADMIN` privilege can allow the granting of a restricted privilege to an unauthorized user.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement, keeping in mind if this is granted in both container and pluggable database, you must connect to both places to revoke.
```
REVOKE <privilege> FROM <grantee>;
```
error_message: Database System Privileges were found on one or more unauthorized 'GRANTEE'
ruleNames: Ensure 'DBA_SYS_PRIVS.%' Is Revoked from Unauthorized 'GRANTEE' with 'ADMIN_OPTION' Set to 'YES'
